info.name: SWBFGamers Dark Metalic
info.description:
A work in progress dark theme for SWBFGamers.com
This is my first style for stylish.
info.additionalInfo:
#Changes
1. Fixed bug where header image isn't sized correctly on mobile. This bug isn't this styles fault, but we fixed it anyways ;) background-size is now auto width, and full height of header element.
This means the header now appears as it should. This may be patched with next smf release?
